RumorFact.Text: A scroll in the Deep Storm Station reveals that a Nomai named Cassava built the Inspired to cause massive destruction to the source of ghost matter.

AltText.Text: A scroll in the Deep Storm Station reveals that a Nomai named Cassava built the Inspired to cause massive destruction to the source of the Interloper.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a frozen comet hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.

AltText.Text: An artificial comet made of gravity crystals hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.

ExploreFact.Text: The Inspired was a superweapon made to bring massive destruction to the source of ghost matter.

AltText.Text: The Inspired was a superweapon made to bring massive destruction to the source of the Interloper.

ExploreFact.Text: I found schematics on the Construction Yard detailing the construction of something called the Inspired.
The Inspired's construction required all available gravity crystals, and a white hole warp core obtained from the Deep Storm Station's paired warp cores.
The Inspired's lattice is incomplete, with entry points at the front of the structure.
After realizing the Hearthians were on the verge of extinction, a Nomai named Cassava decided to launch the Inspired towards Timber Hearth after exchanging its warp core.
The Inspired was kept in stationary orbit around Giant's Deep in case containment of ghost matter was breached.
